Comments_List:
I learned a great deal about second language acquisition and foreign language teaching.

The course helped improve my teaching ad made me become more self-aware of my successes and shortcomings as a language instructor.

I could develop my linguistics skills in order to help language student. I feel that the study and reflections of all those approaches and teaching methods gave me a clear insight about the act of learning and specially of teaching.
No weaknesses. The course is complete, pratical, informative and very useful.

Yes. I think this is a genuinely helpful course if you're insteresting in having foreign language instructor in your CV. It will also help you improve as an instructor (and not just for language courses).
I would totally recommend the course!
